inclusion.criterion: female patient undergoing mastectomy simple radical with or without axilla dissection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: literate and can read and write in either English, Hindi, Marathi
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to fill forms and post them and/or answer questions on phone
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patient who has previously undergone major surgery around breast and chest wall
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 45-year-old woman with abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting. She has hypercholesterolemia and two C/sections. She is menopausal and does not smoke or drink alcohol.
